title: Artist Highlight
content: Steve Lacy’s blend of R&B and indie tones proves that bedroom music can hit stadium levels.

title: Song Note
content: ‘Good Days’ by SZA feels like a daydream caught between anxiety and healing — soft but still sharp.

title: Random Thought
content: Rediscovering an old song feels like meeting your younger self and realizing you’ve both changed, but the feeling still hits.
